links.title: 6 Top Stock Options for Millennials Right Now
links.description: Millennials is the term generally applicable to individuals who reached adulthood around the turn of the 21st century. This generation makes up around 25% of the U.S. population. The new guidelines per Pew Research Center define the birth years for millennials to range between 1981 and 1996.

links.title: Apple Announces its iPhone Event -- Here's What to Expect
links.description: It's that time of year again for Apple ( AAPL) fans. On Thursday morning, Apple sent out invites for an event that will be held at 1 PM Eastern Time on Wednesday, September 12th, at its Cupertino, CA headquarters.

links.description: Google is still within a powerful wave ((III) and in the process of ending a super cycle degree in the next few years. We believe the cycle which started at 2009 low will end sometimes between 2020-2022. By that time, Google would have reached the minimum target of $1250.
